trends: There have been no other sightings in American Falls
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving to work on the same route i have driven for the last 5 years, the weather was very windy with off and on rain. i saw a strange light off in the distance that had a strange blue\ white glow and thought it was a airplane off in the distance. as i approached bannock peak gas station the object came into view, i reduced speed to 60 and noticed that the object was over a canal on my left side with pulsing blue to white lights. as i passed the object i noticed that the object was starting to move north towards inl over the road. i checked my passenger rear view mirror and saw the object was now on my right side. i slowed down to get a better look and was no longer able to see the object. i did not know what it was but it was very weird to see a light off a highway where normally nothing is there.
Summary: driving to work saw light hovering over canal then it headed north towards INL
